parts.text:
Hi! I'm your Cyoda Setup Assistant. You can use the Canvas panel for local repo/workflow work and the Cloud panel for environment and credential management. 

I've displayed the setup menu ‚Äî please pick an option and I'll help you from there.

args.question: How can I help you get started?

options.label: üåê Check Environment Status
options.description: Verify if your Cyoda cloud is ready

options.label: üöÄ Local Setup Guide
options.description: Step-by-step commands to run your app

parts.text:
Great ‚Äî I can show the exact local setup steps, but I need to know which path your app uses.

Is your app a Python app or a Java app? Reply with "Python" or "Java" and I'll show the step-by-step commands. If you're not sure, tell me a file from your repo (e.g., requirements.txt, build.gradle, pom.xml) and I can help identify it.
